info.name: url-shortener
info.description:
postman collection for the url-shortener app.

if "baseUrl" variable is not specified you can add it in the collection variable as http://localhost:8080  

If you will not use the default 8080 port please update the "baseUrl" variable in the collection.

request.description:
generate a short url based on the request sent in the body

body example:

``` json
{
    "originalUrl" : "https://www.portagecybertech.com"
}


 ```

return a json as a response

response example:

``` json
{
    "originalUrl": "https://www.portagecybertech.com",
    "shortCode": "E86357zZl6",
    "shortUrl": "http://localhost:8080/E86357zZl6"
}

 ```
fetch all Urls from the database

fetch original Url based on the short code passed as a path variable

example: `http://localhost:8080/IqyVwTwFiOs`

response example:

``` json
{
    "originalUrl": "https://www.portagecybertech.com",
    "shortCode": "E86357zZl6",
    "shortUrl": "http://localhost:8080/E86357zZl6"
}

 ```
